Author: Ashtrashbdash
Text: Hey. I have gone through this and it’s fucking awful.    First of all, as I’m sure you know and probably have experienced in trying to quit stimulant laxatives, our bodies get dependent on them and there is a really uncomfortable time (maybe a month or so) of readjustment.    Everyone gave me the same advice. Eat more fiber. Drink more water. Go on walks.    Those things are great, but did not help and I always ended up going back to the teas because I was uncomfortable AF and seriously looked pregnant because I couldn’t go.    Finally found a dr who had experience in treating my specific situation and got a solution.    Obviously all of previously mentioned things, but also Miralax. Specifically, in the evening I do 1 1/2 capfuls mixed into a 16oz hot tea.   Also, magnesium. I really like a products called Calm. I mix a Tbsp into a 1/2 cup of hot water and just slam it right before bed. If I don’t have Calm, I’ll just take a magnesium supplement ~200mg.    These two things changed my life.    It took a while for the bloating to subside. But I have become regular and don’t depend on the tea anymore.    I would also recommend fermented foods and things with live cultures- rebuild the bacteria in your gut and intestines after the destructive action of the laxatives.    I truly wish you the best. I know that is a total hell to be experiencing, but there is a light at the end of the tunnel!!
